description: Part single storey rear/side extension and part two storey rear extension including extension to outrigger
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 1012 AL(04)1100 Rev03 - Proposed Plans and 1012 AL(05)1150 Rev 03 - Proposed Elevations
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies D1 and D2 of the London Plan 2021, policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D1, D2, D4 and D6 of  London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
| No new openings to the extension hereby approved shall be incorporated without prior written confirmation from the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D1, D4 and of the London Plan 2021), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f) and 2.10(c) Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012
